A warm glowing welcome awaits you

  • Massage Therapy

    Relieve your aches and pains.

    Massage treatments offer a sanctuary from the daily grind, melting away tension and easing those persistent aches and pains.

  • Facial Treatments

    Rejuvenate and revitalize skin

    Facial treatments provide a refreshing boost to the skin, promoting a healthy and radiant complexion.

  • Manicures & Pedicures

    Hands and Feet that Shine

    Manicures and pedicures offer the perfect blend of relaxation and care, leaving hands and feet looking refreshed and polished.

  • Eye Treatments

    Elevate your natural beauty

    From perfectly sculpted brows to dramatically lifted lashes, my treatments are designed to enhance your natural beauty.

  • Hair Removal

    Experience the freedom of smooth, hair-free skin.

    Achieve beautifully smooth skin while enjoying a personalised and relaxing experience.

  • Spa Treatments

    Unwind and reconnect with yourself

    Body treatments designed to soothe your muscles, calm your mind, and leave you feeling refreshed and revitalised.

Awaken your beauty in the heart of North Devon's tranquility

Beauty Awakening, by Chantelle is set in the stunning and tranquil gardens of Castle Hill, Filleigh, North Devon.

Unwind, Rejuvenate, and Rediscover Your Glow!

Whether you want to indulge in a dreamy facial and float away for a little while, or a gorgeous massage to take those aches and pains away… there is something here for everyone.

Please take a look at my treatment menu to see all treatments available, and please don’t hesitate to get in touch if you have any questions at all.

Have a beautiful day, and I can’t wait to meet you. Chantelle x
